title: Regarding the new Tribunal
body:
After reading about how the whole new tribunal has been in development, I started to wonder how it is coming along. It has been a while since riot has actually told us about it and from what I read, the old tribunal has been taken out of all the servers to make way for the new one.

So would it be possible to perhaps maybe just get an update about what's been happening with the new tribunal, how far into it they are, and when it might roll out?

replies.body:
There was recent post on the leauge of legends subreddit, [ Kotaku Tribunal Summary](http://www.kotaku.com.au/2015/05/league-of-legends-is-bringing-back-an-old-system-to-deal-with-jerks/) here is an article which just summarising it, here is the actual article [ Lol Sub Reddit](http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/31oi8d/why_we_are_not_a_gutless_community_and_why_we/cq3usqf)
I hope this helps
- _Gold Poro_
